title: Landscape
creator_contributor_role: ZKM Institut fur Bildmedien, Karlsruhe, producer
ZKM Institut fur Bildmedien, Karlsruhe, production facilities
abstract: a miraculous moment as time stops in a small German village, the rain ceases to fall and raindrops glitter frozen in the air
description: In a small German village, time stops in the middle of a storm. Raindrops glitter frozen in the air, and the only living thing is the roving eye of the camera which moves through this frozen moment of time. Using complex digital animation techniques, Tamas Waliczky invites the viewer to reimagine how time and space are perceived and proposes a new virtual experience of the body's movement through space.
